product_name: Hincapie Sportswear Edge Bike Jersey - Men's
long_description: Sleek and super lightweight, the men's Hincapie Edge Bike Jersey features race-inspired construction for maximum performance, and a hidden reflective surface for enhanced visibility. Soft, ultralight polyester/spandex fabric wicks moisture away from the skin and dries quickly. Jersey provides an aerodynamic fit that hugs the body to reduce drag. Stretch-mesh provides flexible ventilation and quick-drying performance. Offers outstanding UPF 50+ sun protection from harmful UVA/UVB rays. Collar is made with highly visible reflective HyperOptic(TM) elastane. 3 rear pockets include a waterproof zippered pocket to protect a cellphone from moisture. Armbands on the men's Hincapie Edge Bike Jersey grip comfortably to stay in place as you ride hard.
short_description: Sleek and super lightweight, the men's Hincapie Edge Bike Jersey features race-inspired construction for maximum performance, and a hidden reflective surface for enhanced visibility.
